title: Future Learning Readiness and Self-Regulated Learning-Based Language Proficiency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital devices (smartphones) and intermediate-level language comprehension
context.additional_context: Language learning environment combining smartphone-based VR simulations with self-regulated learning strategies, where learners iteratively improve their learning process by applying self-regulation techniques after resolving real-life language problems in simulated scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can solve over 70% of language problems presented in a VR simulation environment using self-regulated learning strategies (goal setting, monitoring, reflection).
When encountering new language tasks (future learning), learners can apply and adjust prior knowledge in at least two ways to solve problems.
Learners can improve language learning efficiency by over 30% through weekly self-regulated learning journaling and feedback implementation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
